entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 6:52 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:52 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:52 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
